channel.title: Eurotunnel on African Uhambo
channel.description: Recent content in Eurotunnel on African Uhambo

item.title: Almost gone
item.description:
Well we are at this time just over 40 minutes late on our booked departure time, the board is saying we'll depart an hour and six minutes late.

Luckily apart from not having a place to stay yet when we get to France, we have nowhere important to be.

Seen a nicely refurbished Mercedes truck, which has been converted for overland travel, it is from Switerland. I remember seeing those things as a kid in the desert with water tanks on the back tackling dunes. Nice ride, wish I got a pic.
